name: Hop to, Kangaroo!
description:
A short puzzlescript game about helping a stranded kangaroo find their way home.

CONTROLS:

W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys - Move

X - Select (in Menus)

Z - Undo

R - Restart Level

( If your keys don't seem to work, click on the window to make sure it is in focus! )

Latest version - v1.2 -  20180424
